info.name: pseudoPerlin white vs blue noise
info.description:
Perlin-like (value noise) fractal cascade.
Left  using white noise.     Right: with blue noise.
Top:linear cascade.          Bottom: turbulence, i.e. abs(2T-1)   ( NB: (1.-abs) for flames look )

renderpass.code:
#define c xxxx  // color use: xxxx or xyza
#define  Tb(U)  ( 2.* texture( iChannel0, ( U ) / 1024. ).c - 1. )
#define  Tw(U)  ( 2.* texture( iChannel1, ( U ) / 256.  ).c - 1. )
#define aTb(U)   abs( Tb(U) )
#define aTw(U)   abs( Tw(U) )

#define noise(T) ( T(U) + T(2.*U)/2. + T(4.*U)/4. + T(8.*U)/8. + T(16.*U)/16. ) / 1.9375

void mainImage( out vec4 O, vec2 u )
{
    vec2 M = iResolution.xy/2.,
         U = u/16. + iTime;
    
    O = u.y > M.y
        ? u.x < M.x ? .5+.5*noise( Tw) : .5+.5*noise( Tb)
        : u.x < M.x ?       noise(aTw) :       noise(aTb);
    
    O = pow(O,vec4(1./2.2));  // to sRGB
}
